summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of 6 new CustodyKeeper features: Dark mode toggle, Timeline page, Journal multi-child filter, Print buttons, and Calendar recurring events. All features working correctly.

issues: Missing aria-describedby attribute - console warning but not critical (inherited from previous iteration)

passed_tests: Dark mode toggle - Sun/Moon icon in header clicks and toggles theme correctly
Dark mode persistence - Theme persists after page reload via localStorage (custodykeeper-theme)
Dark mode HTML class - HTML element correctly gets 'dark' or 'light' class
Timeline page - Loads at /timeline with chronological records view
Timeline page - Shows all record types: Violation, Event, Journal, Document
Timeline filters - Type filter dropdown works with options: Journal Entries, Violations, Calendar Events, Documents
Timeline search - Search input present and functional
Timeline date filters - Date range filters present (From/To dates)
Timeline sort - 'Newest First' toggle button present
Journal page - Child filter dropdown present and shows children (Emma, Jack) with colored indicators
Journal page - Print button present and labeled correctly
Journal page - Export button present
Violations page - Print button present and labeled correctly
Violations page - Export button present
Calendar - Add Event dialog has 'Recurring Event' toggle switch
Calendar - Recurring toggle enables recurrence pattern dropdown
Calendar - Recurrence pattern dropdown has 4 options: Daily, Weekly, Every 2 Weeks, Monthly
Calendar - End Repeat (optional) date field present with helper text
Calendar - Recurring event creation - Creates event with recurring:true, recurrence_pattern, recurrence_end_date fields
Calendar - Recurring events display - Shows on multiple dates in calendar view according to pattern
critical_code_review_comments: DialogContent aria-describedby warning persists but is non-critical
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_Recurring_Weekly_Event for testing recurring events - cleaned up after test
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 6 requested features tested and working: 1) Dark mode toggle with localStorage persistence, 2) Timeline page with filters (type, search, date range), 3) Journal multi-child filtering, 4) Print buttons on Journal and Violations pages, 5) Calendar recurring events with Daily/Weekly/Biweekly/Monthly patterns. Clean test run with no failures.

components: Child filter dropdown showing Emma and Jack with colored indicators
Repeat Pattern dropdown (Daily, Weekly, Every 2 Weeks, Monthly)
Recurring events showing on multiple dates
